nodes.text: Toborro's Palace was a palace on Makeb that belonged to the Hutt Cartel's Supreme Mogul, Toborro the Hutt, during the Conquest of Makeb. The renowned Doctor Juvard Illip Oggurobb had built and designed the palace for the Grand Mogul and had even built a secret entrance into the palace without Toborro's knowledge. This entrance later gave the Republic the upper-hand in the invasion and allowed a hero to get into Toborro's throne room and defeat him.
